00077   FeTrgData(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) { 
00078     assert ( _obj->getNFloat() == 0 );
00079     assert ( _obj->getNDouble() == 0 );
00080     assert ( _obj->getNInt() >= kNFeTrgDataIntValues );
00081   }

00087   FeTrgData &setBoardID(int boardID) {obj()->setIntVal(kFeTrgDataIntValBoardId,boardID); return *this;};
00088 
00090   int getBoardID() const {return getIntVal(kFeTrgDataIntValBoardId);};
00091

00094   {obj()->setIntVal(kFeTrgDataIntValRecLabel, label); return *this;};
00095

00130   FeTrgData &setFifoWord(unsigned int word_index, unsigned int word) 
00131   {obj()->setIntVal(kNFeTrgDataIntValues+word_index,word); return *this;};
00132 
00137   FeTrgData &setAllFifoWords(unsigned int n_words, const unsigned int * const word_list) 
00138   { 
00139     
00140 
00141     for(unsigned int word_i=0; word_i<n_words; word_i++) {
00142       obj()->setIntVal(kNFeTrgDataIntValues+word_i,word_list[word_i]); 
00143     }
00144     return *this;
00145   };
00146 
00149   int getNFifoWords() const {
00150     return getNInt()-kNFeTrgDataIntValues;
00151   };
00152 
00156   int getFifoWord(unsigned int word_index) const {
00157 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00158     if (word_index>static_cast<unsigned int>(getNFifoWords()) ) {
00159       throw std::out_of_range("FeTrgData::getFifoWord> word index out of range!");
00160     }
00161 #endif
00162     return getIntVal(kNFeTrgDataIntValues+word_index);
00163   };
00164   
00177   IntVec &getFifoWords(IntVec &dest) const {
00178     dest.clear();
00179     for (unsigned int word_i=0; word_i < static_cast<unsigned int>( getNFifoWords() ); word_i++) {
00180       dest.push_back(getFifoWord(word_i));
00181     }
00182     return dest;
00183   };

00191   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00192     os << " board: " << BoardID(getBoardID()) <<std::endl
00193        << " record label: " << getRecordLabel() << std::endl
00194        << " header=" << getHeaderWord() << std::endl
00195        << " trailer" << getTrailerWord() << std::endl
00196        << " trigger counter" << getTriggerCounter() << std::endl;
00197 
00198       for (unsigned int fifo_i=0; fifo_i < static_cast<unsigned int>(getNFifoWords()); fifo_i++) {
00199         os << " " << std::setw(8) << std::hex << getFifoWord(fifo_i);
00200         if (fifo_i%4==3) {
00201           os << std::endl;
00202         }
00203       }
00204     
00205     os << std::endl;
00206   };
00207

00215   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00216     return "i:board_ID, i:record_label, i:Header, i:Trailer, i:Triggercounter, i[n]:fifowords" ;
00217   }
